description:
Alibaba Saluja is the former third Prince of the Balbadd Kingdom. He was working as a cart driver when he first met http://anidb.net/ch46725 [Aladdin]. With Aladdin`s help, he has conquered the 7th Dungeon and obtained his Djinn, http://anidb.net/ch50003 [Amon]. He`s also Aladdin`s King Vessel.
He was the co-leader of the Fog Troupe and a childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch49501 [Kassim].
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Alibaba Saluja
